sections.description: A toolkit for integrating various Generative AI services into the WordPress content workflow.
sections.changelog:
v2.6.1

  • fix(updater): Resolve fatal error and translation loading issues during update checks.

v2.6.0

  • feat(a11y): Automatically set alt text for generated images using the post title.

v2.5.0

  • refactor(core): Removed all image optimization functionality to focus on core AI features.

v2.1.0 - v2.4.0

  • feat: Added and refined image optimization features using pngquant and Imagick (since removed).
  • refactor: Reorganized plugin into a multi-file structure for better maintainability.

v2.0.0

  • feat: Refactored into an extensible 'kit' architecture.
  • feat: Added tabbed settings page for multiple AI providers.
